thread.title: Support for Christie’s White House Bid Drops at Home
thread.title_full: Support for Christie’s White House Bid Drops at Home - WSJ

author: Heather Haddon
title: Support for Christie’s White House Bid Drops at Home
text:
New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie is losing support for his 2016 presidential bid among Republicans in his home state, with businessman Donald Trump opening a wide lead, a poll released Thursday showed.
Mr. Christie was the first choice of 5% of Republican and GOP-leaning voters in New Jersey, down from 12% in August and 32% last December,...
